title: 53: The Starbucks Episode
itunes:title: The Starbucks Episode
description: Hot drinks… iced ones... frozen frapps, pastries, protein bowls, and so much more! Starbucks has so many yummy-sounding choices, but is there anything there that’s healthy?? We’re happy you asked, because in this episode, Lisa has your one-stop guide on what to order at Starbucks! From drinks to breakfast, lunch, and even dinner, this episode has it all! Plus, the gang tries the brand-new Mango Dragonfruit Starbucks Refreshers! So sit back and grab a cup of coffee, we’re going on a food and drink tour of Seattle’s greatest export on Chew The Right Thing! [www.hungry-girl.com/foodcast](https://hungry-girl.com/foodcast)
